body:
> It's better to be uniform.

Yes, totally agreed.

> Besides location, is there any other sensor that doesn't provide instantaneous update? heart rate?

All sensors both on Android and iOS have higher level async APIs. Sensor data is provided by an internal events queue on both platforms (you can directly consume it on Android). Higher level listener/notifier structs are fed by these queues. I was thinking of adopting async APIs for all our sensor data notifiers and directly depend on the higher level layer rather than consuming/filtering "raw" data.
